name: Dave Merheje
bio: Winner of Just For Laugh's 2011 Irwin Barker Homegrown Comic Award and NOW Magazine's 2011 Best of Toronto Award for Best Male Stand-up in 2011, a Canadian Comedy Award-nominee for Best Stand-up in 2012 and another nomination for NOW Magazine's Best of Toronto Award in 2013. Merheje was profiled as one of Canada's next breakout stars on CBC Radio One's Laugh Out Loud. He has been featured on CBC Radio One's The Debaters, XM Radio's Laugh Attack, Bite TV's Stand Up with Bite and Stand up & Bite Me Competition, MTV's MTV Showtown, MuchMusic's Video on Trial and Stars Gone Wild, MTV'sCocktails and The Comedy Network short Worst Gig Ever.
